# sourceIndexPath

**Instance Property**

The index path of the item in the collection view, if any.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var sourceIndexPath: IndexPath? { get }
```

## Discussion

If the item originated from the collection view, this property contains the item’s original index path.

## Getting the Item Information

- **previewSize**: The size of the drag item’s preview.

items.description: The size of the drag item’s preview.
